Texts.Chs: 为何我会建议从^orange;激光挖掘器^reset;着手？因为它确实是挖掘土块的高效工具！
Texts.Eng: Might I recommend starting with a ^orange;Mining Laser?^reset; They are truly effective tools to use for rapidly digging through dirt!

Without a ^orange;Tinkering Table^reset; you'll be hard-pressed to create ^green;augments, upgrades and specialist tools^reset;. When you get a chance, ^orange;Research^reset; into ^orange;Engineering^reset; and build one for me.
